code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import heartFull from'../Assets/heart-full.png';import heartEmpty from'../Assets/heart-empty.png';import arrow from'../Assets/Arrow.svg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HotelCard=_ref=>{let{hotel}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"hotel-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-image",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(hotel.image,")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chip-heart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"chip",children:hotel.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"heart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:hotel.favorite?heartFull:heartEmpty,alt:"favorite"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-middle",children:hotel.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-small",children:hotel.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hotel-card-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-middle",children:hotel.rating}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-middle",children:hotel.price})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/hotel/".concat(hotel.id),className:"link-to-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"button primary",children:["Find more ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:arrow,alt:"arrow"})]})})]});};export default HotelCard;
